name: Plane Accident: Prologue
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1682340/Plane_Accident/

Wield advanced investigative tools and immerse yourself in the intricacies of aviation disasters in 'Plane Accident: Prologue,' as you decipher the enigma of a plane crash using cutting-edge techniques and expert analysis.

Your task will be to get to the site of the plane crash. With the help of
such tools as a drone find the likely location of the plane wreckage


and Investigate the crash site,


You will have to mark the area of the accident, find evidence


and take photos so that the entire plane wreckage is finally transported to
the hangar. Transporting the plane wreckage is only the beginning of your
investigation. To get to the causes of the crash you will have to
reconstruct the wreckage of the plane,


send parts for analysis or examine the black box.


An integral part of any investigation is questioning witnesses


and gathering all the clues to work out the true scenarioof the cause
of the crash.


Experience a tantalizing glimpse of the aviation mystery world in Plane Accident: Prologue.
But remember, what you see here is just the tip of the iceberg. Dive deeper into the full game to uncover a universe of secrets waiting to be revealed.
